form.label: Scheduler activity by user or app

chart.title: Successful searches
chart.searchTemplate: index="_internal" splunk_server="local" source="*scheduler.log" savedsplunker status=success | timechart span="$span$" partial=false count BY $group_by$

chart.title: Skipped searches
chart.searchTemplate: index="_internal" splunk_server="local" source="*scheduler.log" savedsplunker status=skipped | timechart span="$span$" partial=false count BY $group_by$

chart.title: Total RunTime
chart.searchTemplate: index="_internal" splunk_server="local" source="*scheduler.log" savedsplunker status=success | timechart span="$span$" partial=false sum(run_time) AS RunTime BY $group_by$

chart.title: Total Result Count
chart.searchTemplate: index="_internal" splunk_server="local" source="*scheduler.log" savedsplunker status=success | timechart span="$span$" partial=false sum(result_count) AS ResultCount BY $group_by$

chart.title: Total Actions
chart.searchTemplate: index="_internal" splunk_server="local" source="*scheduler.log" savedsplunker status="success" | timechart span="$span$" sum(eval(mvcount(alert_actions))) As AvgActionCount BY $group_by$
